title: Adaptive Control of Resource Flow to Optimize Construction Work and Cash Flow via Online Deep Reinforcement Learning. (arXiv:2307.10574v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Due to complexity and dynamics of construction work, resource, and cash flows, poor management of them usually leads to time and cost overruns, bankruptcy, even project failure. Existing approaches in construction failed to achieve optimal control of resource flow in a dynamic environment with uncertainty. Therefore, this paper introducess a model and method to adaptive control the resource flows to optimize the work and cash flows of construction projects. First, a mathematical model based on a partially observable Markov decision process is established to formulate the complex interactions of construction work, resource, and cash flows as well as uncertainty and variability of diverse influence factors. Meanwhile, to efficiently find the optimal solutions, a deep reinforcement learning (DRL) based method is introduced to realize the continuous adaptive optimal control of labor and material flows, thereby optimizing the work and cash flows. translated_title: 通过在线深度强化学习实现对资源流动的自适应控制，优化建筑工作和现金流量
translated_abstract: 由于建筑工作、资源和现金流量的复杂性和动态性，对它们的管理不善通常会导致时间和成本超支，甚至项目失败。现有的建筑方法未能在具有不确定性的动态环境中实现资源流动的最优控制。因此，本文引入了一种模型和方法，通过自适应控制资源流动来优化建筑项目的工作和现金流量。首先，建立了一个基于部分可观察马尔可夫决策过程的数学模型，以表达建筑工作、资源和现金流量的复杂相互作用，以及多种影响因素的不确定性和变异性。同时，为了高效地找到最优解，引入了基于深度强化学习（DRL）的方法，实现了对劳动力和物料流动的连续自适应最优控制，从而优化工作和现金流量。为了辅助DRL的训练过程，引入了一种模拟机制。
tldr: 本论文介绍了一种基于在线深度强化学习的自适应控制方法，用于优化建筑项目的工作和现金流量。通过建立数学模型和应用深度强化学习来实现对资源流动的优化控制，提高了建筑项目的管理效果。
